articles.author: Press Association
articles.title: British Airways suspends ticket sales for short-haul flights from Heathrow - TheJournal.ie
articles.description: Customers will be unable to book flights for domestic or European services from the west London airport until Monday week.
articles.content:
BRITISH AIRWAYS HAS halted the sale of tickets for short-haul flights departing from Heathrow Airport for several days.
Customers will be unable to book onto domestic or European services flying fro… [+2474 chars]
